programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.sub-title: Innocence Stolen / Danger at the Door (#112)
programme.desc: A district attorney uses a clever technique--a "John Doe indictment"--to give law enforcement officials the time they need to track down the Schoolgirl Rapist from Rochester, N. Y.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.sub-title: Killer on Campus / The Bow Hunter
programme.desc: Police use DNA found on pantyhose to finally track down the killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.desc: The murder of an Ohio woman in 1974 is solved more than 20 years later after police get a crucial clue--the woman's husband was seen building a coffin-shaped box

programme.title: Cold Case Files
programme.desc: Firefighter Gary Parks is killed in a fire ruled arson.

programme.title: Cold Case Files
programme.desc: A teacher is found murdered and suspicion is cast on her soon to be ex-husband.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.sub-title: A Brother's Burden / The Midnight Attacker (#88)
programme.desc: A police officer helps solve an 18-year-old murder case when he finds the prime suspect-his older brother.

programme.sub-title: A Sister Lost / Rumors of Murder
programme.desc: A high school janitor is suspected in the murder of a young girl.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.desc: On a summer night in 1987 a mother worries and waits for her 19-year-old daughter to come home. But Diana never comes home and she's found raped and strangled.

programme.desc: After an Arkansas man confesses to the brutal murders of two women, police are shocked when the DNA evidence shows that he isn't the killer.
